name: ChartX (RQ)
description: ChartX reasoning questions subset focusing on data interpretation, trend analysis, and numeric comparison over charts.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Correct answer rate on reasoning-focused chart questions

test_method: Provide chart image and question text. The evaluator expects short textual answers or option IDs.
notes: Record whether numerical extraction relied on OCR or vector reconstruction. Some questions require multi-step calculations.
